channel.title: 317 PI gamesave timer?
channel.description:
Where do I change how often a players game is saved? I want it to be like non stop, 0 seconds maybe 1.
Please help

item.title: 317 PI gamesave timer?
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

I HIGHLY do not suggest saving everysecond, example:
you have 50 people, thats 50 x 9kb of data saved every second…

gf your computer if your hosting…a VPS can probably handle that, but I wouldnt put it through the unnecessary saving, 1 minute saves work just fine for me. If you still want to change the time then go to src>server>Config.

hope I helped

post if you have errors, I will help you to the best of my abilities.

Read full topic
